ingredients: 1 cup plain yogurt, 1 (15.25 ounce) can peaches, 2  bananas, sliced,   +   1/4 cup orange juice,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, or to taste, 2 cubes  ice
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 4mg 1%, Sodium 48mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 44g 16%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 36g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 17mg 87%, Calcium 124mg 10%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 524mg 11%
